attributes.action: More funding for schools for SEND.
attributes.additional_details: It is extremely important to provide the right tools and education to SEN children, their teachers and peers to be aware of what signs to look out for to make sure everyone is navigating each other correctly. To expand knowledge on debilitating, non physical disabilities in schools (especially mainstream) to prevent bullying and misunderstanding. Encourage parents of SEN to feel their children are safe and understood.
attributes.background: Providing more funding for not only SEND schools, but also Mainstream with SEN children learning there also.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Identify common needs in EHCPs and require schools to support these by default: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644291

Require schools to have a separate behaviour policy for SEND students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/655780
